title: the delightful guide to poetry forms
description: 'The Delightful Guide to Poetry forms' by Reynaldo Casisonis a wonderful poetry book.For poetry afcionados, writers, and readers, 'The Delightful Guide to Poetry forms' is a fun read and beautiful gift!Featuring the haiku poetry form,quatrain poetry form,sonnet poetry form,lyric poetry form,free verse poetry form,ode poetry form,romantic poetry form,as well as beautiful delightful poems, a luminous read for writers, readers,and poetry afcionados!Read 'The Delightful Guide to Poetry forms' for a beautiful delightful fun poetic experience!
author: Reynaldo Casison
